===Etymology===
From Chinese [[青]] (''qīng'', "[[grue]]", "[[verdant]]") + [[團]] (''tuán'', "[[lump]]", "[[clump]]", "[[ball]]")

{{zh-pron

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[qingtuan|Qingtuan]], a [[sweet]] [[rice]]-[[flour]] [[ball]], [[usually]] [[filled]] with [[red bean]] [[paste]], [[traditionally]] [[consumed]] on [[Tomb Sweeping Day]] in [[China]]
